In this Activity, A ListView will be used to display all favorite songs. Each item includes one imageView on the left,one playing icon which will navigate to playing screen when clicked, and one buy icon on the right side. When buy icon clicked will navigate to payment activity.

There are a search bar at the top of this screen, which can be used to search songs in the server and can be added to this page, and a listView with different category, like Classical Music, Pop Music, Top 100, Purchased and so on. Each category can be clicked and open another page with song items. \nEach song item has a song image, a buy icon and playing icon
